website_summaries.verdict: A great pick for children and music-enthusiasts alike, this high-quality board offers clear tunes with a smooth ride.
pros: Able to sync with your smartphone Bluetooth
Built-in speaker plays music anywhere you go
cons: Included phone app for customizable LED lights can be a little spotty

customer_reviews.title: Best Hover board since sliced bread! 😉
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughters Xmas wish come true. She is on it as much as possible. My house is rearranged so she can go wherever she wants. Its funny and quite entertaining. It’s very durable. I have had no problems. The sound is actually way better then I thought would come from a hover board and the lights well they are just a huge bonus. It came on time exactly as I was promised. I would recommend this hover board. The company Tomoloo seems to really value their customers satisfaction. What a nice little treat Tomoloo. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Reyn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was in search for a hoverboard for my daughter's birthday. I looked up online good ones to buy and they say Tomoloo is the best to buy. All the ones that I was reading about they would be shipped to you broken, have to pay for shipping, problems with Bluetooth, Etc... Tomoloo never had any bad reviews, or complaints! We got ours and it was completely perfect! If I am ever in search of a new hoverboard I will definitely order from here! I highly recommend! The shipping was super fast, love the price, love the color, love the Bluetooth capability and lights! My daughter cannot stay off of it! She loves her hoverboard!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Flemming

customer_reviews.title: unsure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our son’s 10th birthday. The 1st use was good. It was Fun & he absolutely loved to ride while playing music! We charged it overnight, and the very 2nd use he couldn’t get on it. Kept beeping & spinning off, very fast. He wasn’t able to step on it, it was dangerous. I called amazon customer service & they gave us a credit so we can re-order a new one. Hoping the new one works like it should! I will update my review after we try the new hoverboard.
customer_reviews.author: LAAJ

customer_reviews.title: He Hopped right on and rides great. Indoor use only right now
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my 4 year old. He Hopped right on and rides great. Indoor use only right now. We have an outside one too..not this brand We like this one cause it lights up. Really neat! Make sure you follow the instructions before you power it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: My son just got this hoverboard yesterday and he's been playing with it non stop since! He's 7 years old and has no problem controlling it... even his little 4 year old sister rides it! The lights are an extra cool effect (especially in the dark). It has nice large rubber wheels with multi color lights, and it even arrived charged so my son could play right away. It charges fully within 2-3 hours and lasts for about 3 hours of play. This is fun for the whole family. Now his sister wants one for Christmas. I would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M.

customer_reviews.title: She loved the lights and the music on this board that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 11 year old granddaughter. She loved the lights and the music on this board that "her friends didn't have." It was also great to have it all charged up and ready to go right out of the box. She got on and rode it immediately with good balance. Then her 15 year old brother and 20 year old brother began bribing her for chances to ride. She gave in and, though they took longer to master the ride, they now are avid fans as well. It has been a hit for boys and girls and an age span.
customer_reviews.author: Kenney

customer_reviews.title: All rubber wheels!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this hover board for an early birthday present. We read many reviews, and choose the Tomoloo board as it has all rubber wheels. It is sturdy feeling, self- balancing and feels like a quality item. It came fully charged, and lights are amazing!! The Bluetooth hooked to our phone in seconds and the music quality is really good. Thanks for a great product Tomoloo!!
customer_reviews.author: suzy nelson

customer_reviews.title: TOMOLOO Hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old granddaughter and she absolutely loves it! Charged it up and balanced it according to the instructions. Took her about 5 minutes to get used to the balance and then she was riding it all over the place! Linked her phone to the BT on the board and she played her music with no problems and the sound quality was not bad at all! Overall first impressions are very positive, everything works well and quality looks to be excellent. I will update this review if any problems show up later on, but for now, 2 Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.author: terry V

customer_reviews.title: Better than promised!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She LOVES it! The fact that it has a blue tooth speaker and lights really attracted her to this particular one. Shipping was super fast (4 days quicker than we were promised) and that is very important to me, especially since I typically wait until the last minute to order gifts! This seller has contacted me directly to give me updates about my order and to make sure everything is o.k. Love the product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Hoverboard, Kids Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hoverboard for my son's birthday. I had originally purchased a different one from a different manufacturer, due to issues with that one, I returned it and ordered this one. SO glad i did. Kids easily learned how to maneuver the hoverboard. They love the bluetooth functionality. Have had this for 2-3 weeks now, but overall seems like a really quality product. I would definately recommend anyone looking for a hoverboard to stop looking at other models and go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: bilthuisjm

customer_reviews.title: The flashing LED lights were also a great addition adding style
customer_reviews.text: The Hoverboard was purchased as a birthday present for my 9 yr old grandson and it was a smashing success. He was quickly able to mount, ride and navigate the board. The bluetooth feature was big hit, as the music provided him with rhythm for his "moves"(his words). The flashing LED lights were also a great addition adding style. I was impressed with the packaging and the ease of operation. As a side benefit I think the operation will over time add muscle tone to his legs and core.
customer_reviews.author: M Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This hover board is really amazing. The fact that you can ride it and play music through bluetooth is game changer. My daughter loved it and rides it every day. Battery last as long as it is advertised. We've been to the mall a few times and boy that thing can go forever. I recommend this product for your kids. Very strong and durable. I rode it and boy am I heavy. Daughter says she throwing a rolling disco party every time. It looks beautiful at night. It's been a month since i got it and have had no issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo

customer_reviews.title: Works but not able to access feature/settings
customer_reviews.text: I have tried three different phones and have not been able to get the app to access the hover board. I have been able to pair the board's speaker with all the phones but the app cannot access the board in order to modify the user level or any of the other settings/games. This leaves you with a very basic ability to use this hover board. If anyone... especially the seller has any ideas I would like to know what they would suggest before I am forced to return it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: R. MIller

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work. TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: It was so much fun, and then it stopped working a couple weeks later. It never even left our one story house so it's not like it was being abused or anything. Just randomly one day it stopped turning right! We returned the broken one and a new one was sent to us. Right out of the box it didn't work. One of the wheels didn't rotate at all! Returned and giving up entirely. I'm really bummed. How does this have such good ratings!?
customer_reviews.author: Lightningboltgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was such an awesome find! I scoured the internet for safe hover board options for my 11yr old. We gave it to her as a gift for her birthday. The look is sleek, the lights are great, and the Bluetooth music option is awesome. But the best part is that it was so easy for my daughter to use. She brings it with her wherever she can. Battery holds out for a long time. Completely satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TERosa

customer_reviews.title: Used 1 day and broke down
customer_reviews.text: After using the item for just one day the item started to malfunction, the mechanism could not hold flat making the item not usable, then I returned the item and requested to receive the exact same item and they shipped a horrible pick fuschia when it supposed to be black. I could not give "0" stars but If I could I would, extremely disappointed with this product. I understand why they have good reviews, they offer you cheap gifts in exchange of a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Gomez Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the Tomoloo hover board! Actually the whole family does. I am going to get another one soon because one is not enough to go around for 6 people. This one was also for my daughters 11th birthday. Was a bit tricky syncing to the app but no problems once we had it set up.
customer_reviews.author: Karini Maximoss

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard + Total Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: This hoverboard worked for around 11 months. My kids used it indoors only, and took good care of it. Then one day, it began shutting off unexpectedly, causing the rider to be violently thrown off. We had purchased the extended warranty for an additional $24.99, so I was hopeful the problem could be fixed or the hoverboard could be replaced. WRONG. The techs at the extended warranty company told me this problem was caused by a defective battery, which was not covered by the warranty. A replacement battery sells for $70 on Amazon. So, not only does this product represent a significant safety hazard, it turned out to be a total ripoff, including the worthless extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our twin daughters and it is hands-down, the best gift of the season. They have not stopped riding them since the moment they tore into the box. The quality is exceptionally high, the girls have mastered their technique and even have coordinated routines on their boards. The bluetooth syncing is very high quality and we love the LED lights that blink all over the board as they ride. It's an amazing purchase and I'm very pleased overall!
customer_reviews.author: JBeans

customer_reviews.title: They did not do as promised
customer_reviews.text: Update: Tomoloo told me that they were going to send me a virtual reality set it I wrote a review but its a month later and I still did not get it. My son has been asking for a hover board for the longest time ans we were skeptical about getting one because it could be dangerous and hearing some of them catch fire but we saw this one had amazing reviews and it did not dissapoint. My son and all his friends love it. It moves well and is so cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves riding his Hover Board!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old nephew for Christmas! It takes about 5 minutes or so to learn how to balance. We all had to try it out so I held onto each rider while they practiced around the house. It was important that I bought one that is UL Certified. He has been using it almost everyday & enjoys the Bluetooth speakers & lights!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Rouw

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: The hover board lasted for 30 days. Then suddenly cannot get it to turn on. Have contacted the maker several times with zero response. I picked this because of the good reviews and the risk of overheating was low. However, now we have a dead piece of technology, and the only recourse we had (the maker) has failed to respond. Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Westerman

customer_reviews.title: Only good for 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: The first six months, my son LOVED it! However, after 6 months, it no longer worked. I pulled the manual and did all of the troubleshooting it said to do. All of it was unsuccessful. When my 8 year old tried to ride it, it goes crazy! Back/forth in jerking motions where you cannot stay on it for 2 seconds. Unfortunately I could not find a way to contact the company. Now, it just sits there. My son has asked for a new one over and over but I can’t afford another. He finally asked Santa for a repair kit so he can try to figure out how to fix it 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great board, bad app.
customer_reviews.text: Love the board itself, well made and holds a charge for awhile! My 8 year old mastered it no problem. I took a star away only because of the app, I can’t get it to work properly from any device and unfortunately that is what controls the lights , music and speed settings. So it is just a regular hover board the way we have to use it and only goes as fast as the lowest speed (3mph) which could also be a good thing ! Overall pleased with the actual board.
customer_reviews.author: R. DePaul

customer_reviews.title: unit received was defective
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received was defective and I am getting a new one shipped out via Amazon and hope to leave revised feedback once we get the new one. This unit charged over night and upon turning it on, one of the pads appears to think a foot is already on it because as soon as you put your first foot on the board, it tries to run away from you. As an FYI, we own several boards and have experience riding. This one is just flawed and hopefully the new one will work great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alford

customer_reviews.title: Stops working/customer service won’t respond
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset. We bought 2 of these for Christmas presents and 1 is malfunctioning and tomoloo won’t respond to me. It literally stops mid ride and throws my daughter off and then starts back up. I’ve emailed them 3 times. They asked for a video of it happening. My daughter is too afraid to get back in it. I emailed them all the details and now they will not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cieply

customer_reviews.title: Poor product. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for about a month and then had calibration issues. I was constantly re calibrating it. And then after about four months it would no longer recalibrate. It’s just so jerky and unpredictable now, we cannot ride it. Tried to email the company several times to send it to get fixed. I haven’t heard from them yet. It’s been over a month. Poor product poor service so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Bringas

customer_reviews.title: To always wear a helmet♥️
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!! I got this for my grandsons ninth birthday! He was able to ride it immediately! So neat to see him having so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee B

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for a 9yo
customer_reviews.text: This has to be by far our son’s favorite Christmas gift. I figured it would be kinda cool, that he would appreciate it. But he’s in LOVE with it. He said, Why walk when I can ride this thing every where? Yeah, that’s not so much fun for me when he’s rolling it into the bathroom, or making a plate to eat! But he’s really good on it. Within ten minutes of practicing, he easily got the hang of it. He’s only been using it for like 5 days now, but it does seem very durable. It’s a nice design. And the lights and Bluetooth are def a fun element. So glad we invested in one!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: We finally unboxed the hover board for my daughter’s birthday yesterday and today being the second day we’ve used it one of the wheels does not work and the board will only goes in circles. Hopefully I can get through to customer service to get the issue resolved or exchange for a working board. There is no number in the United States to call so I’m skeptical about the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working and no response from customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. It was great and she really loved it and used it daily. After 3 short months, the hoverboard is no longer working properly. It won't balance and spins in a fast circle throwing my daughter off. We also bought hover shoes for my son. Also great at first but after 2 months, one hover shoe will no longer charge. Attempted to contact company through Amazon and received no response. Hoping I can find another way to contact them to fix these expensive gifts. Will update if anything comes of it. As of right now, we are out $600
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Upham

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product 12 months ago to this day. This was hardly used by our son and was only used indoors. The product was working fine until 6 months ago. One side does not operate although the lights turn on on both side. It was quite dangerous when one side just stopped working, my sone almost flipped off. Suffice it to say, we've been trying to get the SERVICE and SUPPORT team from the manufacturer to help us. VERY POOR RESPONSE. I WOULD SUGGEST NOT BUYING FROM THIS MANUFACTURER! Also the product is NOT RELIABLE based on our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a birthday present for our son and have been thrilled with the board. It does everything that we hoped for, the speaker sounds better than expected, and the whole thing looks awesome. Unfortunately, the hoverboard malfunctioned due to user error. We contacted Tomoloo via email explaining what happened and how much we loved the board. I'll just say that their response went above and beyond. We are totally impressed with the company!
customer_reviews.author: Chad P.

customer_reviews.title: A very fun and stable hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year old granddaughter. It took her about 5 minutes to balance correctly and after that she was whipping around, doing dance steps, and having a great time. The lights are really great and we were surprised when we hooked up the bluetooth with the ipod that the sound from the board was as good. She road it on the carpet and then the driveway. She rode up and down hills with little problem. The stabilizer feature is great and makes it easier to handle. She's done a fair amount of riding on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: marshajk

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. Splitting open at seam.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids birthdays less than a month ago. Within two days of riding they had split open at the seem. The plastic isn’t tough enough to hold together. I have taped and taped and still the board splits open. These are horrible. I bought because they were top rated for twice as much as my Neigbor’s kids boards. At $250 vs the standard $130 price. The Neigbor’s kids boards run great and aren’t falling apart. THESE are. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: MLilyquist

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: (1)Just arrived today. Plugged in to charge and after 30 minutes the charger is super hot. Will update after use. Couldn't find any questions or reviews that mentioned this. (2)Makes a strange sound when operating. Will contact manufacturer/seller but not expected right out of the box. (3) After searching the internet, appears that the issue is lack of weight on the sensor points. Can be somewhat mitigated by placing feet wide apart. However , rattling still there which was not an issue with prior hover boards. Once up to speed the rattle fades.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in under 3 weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our daughter for her bday. We received it on July 27th In less than a month, one side is flashing red and not moving. Hope they will take ownership of this!!!! We are pretty disappointed and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The Coolest!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations!!! This was our first hoverboard purchase (ever) for my daughter's 8th birthday. After researching available options, I decided on Tomoloo. I was super nervous she wouldn't be able to figure out how to balance/ride and would hurt herself trying. It took her about 5 minutes to master and she has been zooming around inside & outside daily since. Lights and music are SO awesome!!! We just purchased a second one for my son's 6th birthday. Everything about this product is first class. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Matherly

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for her 11th birthday. She was so excited to finally get one- she hopped right on and knew exactly what to do. Since it’s winter- I allowed her to use it in the house and ass it’s ok for now- it has left black marks all over floor and if she runs into bottom of our white doors! Not the products fault by any means- this should be used outside in my opinion. I have her clean her wheels often now. It is heavy and charges fine and has been a great gift for this odd age!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first few months....
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun hoverboard, but I was disappointed that when riding it outside, it scrapes the sidewalk easily and now after only a few months, the wheel is shaking and glitching, to the point where it is no longer able to be ridden. I have a very disappointed 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: elaine webb

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and young adults. Not really for full size adults.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a higher weight limit. The Bluetooth connection works well and is easy to acquire. The speaker is plenty loud but not overwhelming. The lights are a really cool feature. I wish it had a weight sensor on/off rather than a manual switch, but the switch function works. Battery indicator isn’t anything special. You can’t really tell by looking at the hoverboard how much charge you have left on it. Great for kids and small adults but I wish it was raised up to 300# for a full grown man to ride.
customer_reviews.author: B. Freed

customer_reviews.title: Okay Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my older daughter and smaller less expensive one for my younger daughter, OTTO Hoverboard Two-wheel Self-balancing Scooter UL2272 Certificated 6.5'' All-terrian Aluminum Alloy Wheels,250W Dual Motor 225lbs Max Weight, Pink. Both daughters loved theirs but the old one kept riding the Otto one. She like the ride and feel of it better. The blue tooth ended up not working on this one out of the box. Had to return it, but the LED worked, and i thought it rode and looked very well.
customer_reviews.author: JIm

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The charging code is not secured properly, I contacted the manufacturer through the email but didn’t respond for 2 days. If they do not respond within a week i am going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nanu

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This hover board has been a blast. Our 12 year old got up and going on it in no time and is running obstacle courses (and even playing basketball on it - the silly games evolve). The lights and music are fun and we’ve been streaming Spotify on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hover board
customer_reviews.text: Over all we may have just gotten a defective board. The self balance did not work on our hover board. It also seemed if you went to fast it would beep and spontaneously stop which led to falling. The board was sturdy, Bluetooth worked well. Maybe be better for adult as opposed to child.
customer_reviews.author: R&S Plumbing Htg & Cooling Inc

customer_reviews.title: Within 2 weeks the battery is not charging and the self balancing system failed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so happy to get this but it lasted only 2 weeks. Now the battery refuses to charge and the self balancing mechanism failed. You can't ride this anymore plus after a 12 hr charge it lasts only for 2 or 3 minutes. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Amit V.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoverboard last month for my daughter's birthday. The last hoverboard we purchased broke within days of us buying it. I'm happy to say that this hoverboard is much lighter and sturdier than our previous purchase. My daughter loves the lights, it has a decent battery life, and she can lift it without assistance. We're very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nishai

customer_reviews.title: Safety issues as son has to ride barefoot.
customer_reviews.text: Ao. Is 69 lbs but with shoes on the green lights will not activate and one side keeps shutting g down....take his shoes off and no issues....he’s been riding it for a month now and he’s a pro so it’s not a balance or position issue....the sensors must not be positioned in a way for smaller feet and 50-60lbs...so he rides it with no shoes....that’s crap for. 200 dollar device. So it works it’s cool...speakers are so so....lights rock. But does not work for lighter kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Giles

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong model
customer_reviews.text: One star off because they sent the wrong model or the description was wrong. One letter difference on in model number and has all different features. Buyer beware. I know if I contacted Amazon they would make good on the purchase, try taking the Hoverboard away from you child and say in two weeks your new one will be in, impossible. The hoverboard it self, just fine, but because they did not ship the correct one, cant tweek the setting in the app. I have no issues with the board, all fun.
customer_reviews.author: C. KEEFE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grand daughter on her 7th birthday. She absolutely loved it, and it works really well. The battery lasts plenty, and she is having so much fun. It seems to be the perfect size for her, has good speed, and goes up slight hills without problems. She got the hang of it within 20 minutes and rides it safely. The bluetooth syncing is very high quality and she love the LED lights that blink all over the board as they ride. It's an amazing purchaseShe is now moving to the music.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed in this product. This was used only indoors by an 8 year old girl who took very good care of it. Despite this, the shell broke in 6 months. When I tried to contact the company about it, I got the run around and never received a satisfactory answer. Also, the asurion protection plan I purchased did not cover the cracked shell. I am very disappointed and will never recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cordisco

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on a whim, when it was on sale for Prime Day. My daughter had been asking for a hover board for a couple months, but had not done any research We saw it on sale and she had enough money saved up so we thought we would give it a try! She is very happy with her purchase. After figuring out how to get on and keep her balance, she has enjoyed riding around the house often. She likes the multi color lights and the blue color of the body is her favorite color. Her favorite part is probably the Bluetooth speaker that connects to her iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saved up to buy this and I think she may never walk around the house again. It took her 1.5 days to get the hang of it and now she is forever zipping around the house. I have tried it a few times as well and the stability is spot on and if ever allowed to be on it for more than 5 min I’m pretty sure I could get as proficient as she has. LOL - she loves playing music on it while zipping around the house and it has a pretty decent speaker and the the lights to music is fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: GisselaB

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for Christmas and I wanted to give it a few months before I wrote. a review. The only one that can ride it is my daughter and she loves it. She rides it around the house and seems to have no trouble maneuvering around. She has never fallen. Others were not as lucky! You need good balance and motor skills for the this. My daughter gives this product 4 stars because it vibrates at low speeds. She does not like that.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 grandchildren - ages 7, 10, 15, and 18. All love it. It took about 20 minutes each, in a soft room, to get started. After that, they were spinning (particularly the dancer) and charging around the house. Another 20 minutes to go around the neighborhood including up ramps. It’s lasting much longer than I expected. I figured that the lights were valuable (so cars could see them), but the music was a waste. It turns out I’m a different generation — they use the music all the time (including dancing).
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good While it Lasted...6 days perhaps.....now waiting to be returned.....painfully regret
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to gift this to our elder son and it was working well for the first few days till all of a sudden there was a crack and returning it became a nightmare. Hence wouldnt recommend it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sreejit

customer_reviews.title: Works great, mostly used indoors for now.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 10 year old daughter. She got on it right away and made it look so easy. Let momma try, whoa buddy!! Never mind momma is gonna break her neck. Absolutely no problems and we are almost on three months of using/having it. Least favorite part “when it loudly states “connecting to Bluetooth!” My daughter usually earns me otherwise my heart falls out of my chest from being so startled.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoverboard in black for my daughter (12), she loved it so much that I ended up getting a blue one for my son (7). They are self balancing so it's easy for my 7 yr to catch on pretty quickly. The lights are really fun and it's really cool that they can play their music from their boards as they ride around. The sound doesn't get too loud but I wouldn't want it to be any louder. Definitely would recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: One side would not hold a charge - had to return
customer_reviews.text: My sons LOVED this when it first arrived and took turns rolling around the house. It worked for the first day and then would not hold a charge on one side. My seven-year-old stepped on after it had been charging overnight and it self-balanced for a second and then spun around rapidly in a full circle, bucking him off. He was wearing a helmet but fell pretty hard. We sent it back right away and I am now back to the drawing board on researching a great (consistently working) hoverboard.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 7 year olds birthday. I was honesty scared, but he played on his friends and learned so fast! He was SO excited with the Bluetooth feature! He loves rolling around listening to kids bop! All the kids love taking turns on it, and the battery impressed me! They all keep riding and I expected it to need a charge very quickly, but so far it’s keeping up nicely! Perfect gift! I will update after a longer period of use and let everyone know how it is holding up in the long run!?
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethK

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I’m so frustrated. This worked great in the beginning and my 8 year old son loved it. It now won’t hold a charge and he was riding it outside and it completely stopped and fell hard and hurt himself. This is after it saying the battery was fully charged. It stopped charging on one side and beeps continuously. Don’t buy this one, pick another.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Mom of the year award for me!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the blue hoverboard for my son’s 8th birthday. It was such a hit that I had to order a second one for my 11 year old daughter (even though it was not her birthday). Both learned to ride it the same day. They love to ride their hoverboards around our subdivision and ask me to play their favorite music over the Bluetooth speakers. Battery life is pretty good. Let’s not forget about the awesome LED lights at night!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Lairmore

customer_reviews.title: Kids' favorite Holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: The boards came already fully charged which was nice. The first day there was some hints of issues such a boards shaking or taking off when one foot was placed on. But all problems have dissipated after re-calibrations, which is as simple as having the board on a flat surface and holding the 'on' button. I purchased 3 of these hover boards and the three kids (ages 9, 12 and 15) won't stop riding them. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bubby Blankman

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned after a month
customer_reviews.text: This worked great initially and is now malfunctioning right after the return window closed. This was an expensive item for me to buy for my daughter. It should’ve lasted longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Spaeth

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. Splitting at seam.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids birthdays less than a month ago. Within two days of riding they had split open at the seem. The plastic isn’t tough enough to hold together. I have taped and taped and still the board splits open. These are horrible. I bought because they were top rated for twice as much as my Neigbor’s kids boards. At $250 vs the standard $130 price. The Neigbor’s kids boards run great and aren’t falling apart. THESE are. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: MLilyquist

customer_reviews.title: Nana approved
customer_reviews.text: I had some real reservations about buying hoverboards for my grandchildren. However after writing to Tomoloo, when I purchased my first one 2 years ago, I felt confident in buying a second one. Not only did they explain the issue with the batteries they put me in touch with their engineer. He answered all of my questions and I was impressed that they took the time to reach out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE::: After a few months of use (MAYBE 5 times a month..AT MOST) the hover board decided to not work. As you can imagine, this was incredibly upsetting for my daughter. I purchased this item for my daughter on her 10th bday. She was stoked since she has been wanting one for a while. The quality is great and it came fully charged so she didn't have to wait to use it. This was a huge plus! The LED lights are super cool and bright. Easy to ride and easy to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Needs some additional features.
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavy. Was hoping my 5 year old would be able to ride but he’s not ready yet. My 7 year old got the hang of it pretty quickly though. Would be nice if it had more features to adjust the lights and came with a carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: dru1313

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love it. They are 6 and 7 and do great in it. I love the safety features. Wish it came with a bag to carry because they are quite heavy. And if you attach your phone to it once every time you are around it it wants to play and will say connecting even if you don’t want it too. Wish there was something to press to connect instead of automatically
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Great hooverboard
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise gift for my 8th year old. He has had a blast riding it since he got it. It was very easy to get a hold of the balance and he is cruising as if he was born on top of it. I have not measured how long the battery really lasts, but there have been a few times where he runs out of juice and gets frustrate. The problem is easy solved with a full charge taking about 2 hours. In the case of my son the lights on the wheels and flashing lights front and back are a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Great hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought each of nephews ages 8-12 one. I was afraid the youngest would struggle but he picked it up faster than the others! They were riding solo within 10 minutes. They love them! The one drawback is I wish they were more scratch resistant. A few tumbles in the beginning and they are already scuffed. The oldest had to Realign it because it started to act up after 30 minutes. Good purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cmorris

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product. I got Q2 X model and one of the reasons to pay this much money was to have the App so that I control and monitor this for my kid. Unfortunately after 2 months I learnt that App will not work in USA. Amazon customer service told me I need to have Chinese VPN or phone to use this app ... 30 days window over so no return ... No support ... I’m not sure what action Amazon is going to take about the seller who is providing wrong information .....
customer_reviews.author: Teji

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHRISTMAS PRESENT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 boys were begging for a Hoverboard and we did a lot of research before buying. We decided on this one and we are glad we did! Its very sturdy and durable... they have flipped it over multiple time but its still going strong and the speaker is awesome. They love riding their new board and they learned to ride really quick!
customer_reviews.author: cnhay5

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: First day with it and my 9 year old loves it. Took him about 45 minutes before he was ripping around. Battery lasted over 2 hours. Should get more battery time now that he has it down. Bluetooth speaker is actually really good on the thing. Right now, it's 5 stars for the money. Will update if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B

customer_reviews.title: I love this product so much I purchased one for each ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much I purchased one for each of my three sons. It is very high quality, from the lights to the Bluetooth capability. Battery life is fantastic! My three boys love these Tomoloo hoverboards and I highly recommend this product to anybody considering a hoverboard purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This Hoverboard is exactly as described. It has a smooth ride and goes fast (a little too fast for this mom). My daughter loves that it has a Bluetooth speaker and the range on the connection to your phone is decent. The battery life is also good. The battery on this model lasts longer than some of the cheaper ones so I think it is worth paying a little extra to receive a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect one for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son has been dying for a hooverboard, two of his good friends have so he knows what to do with them. I did my research and liked this one so got it for my sons b-day. He loves it, says it is better than the other ones his friends have as it is smooth and easy to work with. You don't lean forward as much on this one as some of the other ones. We are happy as is he..
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Leininger

customer_reviews.title: really cool hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a 7 yr old. read the instructions!! the first night we didn’t stabilize it. and then the next day we took the time to read and that really helped. also, it does vibrate but it’s related to my child’s weight. by changing how she stands on the board, she’s able to better distributes the weight and stops the vibrating. great toy. i wish the body was more scratch proof but it’s an outdoor toy so i don’t think that can be helped.
customer_reviews.author: VARGAS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hover board!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to be hooked! We ordered this for my daughter's 10th birthday and of course as soon as it came in my husband and 13 year old nephew had to test it out. They have actually been riding it the past few nights after she goes to bed! It's beautiful, kinda heavy, but it seems like it's good quality. The lights are bright, the speakers are loud and clear and it rides so smooth. I am so excited to see her face once she opens this present!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good times for all!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas kids use it inside and outside. Who am I kidding, the adults use it to. As far as ease-of-use, the kids seem to get a handle on it a lot quicker than the adults. It's easy to pair with your cell phone or other music playing device, it's a good quality battery lasts a long time and the lights are fun. I would definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: For Christmas gift - some issues...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and we were very excited. This was to be a Christmas gift. As a short time has gone by, we have had some issues with the board, its functionality and weight limits and other questions and the seller is non-responsive. The product listing shows that it will hold up to 220 lbs but the product itself show only up to 165 lbs. =( Sadly, we will likely need to return it if we can't get resolution quickly. At this point, I can't recommend the product or seller. If they contact me and make it right, I will be sure to update my review and rating.
customer_reviews.author: Truth in History

customer_reviews.title: They STOP Working fast!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my 8 & 7 yo sons for Christmas. We have barely used them as we live north of Boston and the weather has been cold. They may have used them 5 times. They battery life is super short even with a full charge...maybe 15 minutes. One of the 2 has already died! It says it's fully charged and as soon as you take the charger out, it's completely dead! Won't even turn on (but it turns on when plugged in). So angry and disappointed. $400 wasted...
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Ross

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Here is his review: "I got this hoverboard as a Christmas present this year and absolutely love it. Although it can be dangerous if you’re careless. The one thing I don’t like about is that it makes this weird beeping noise when you go fast and it’s just annoying. Even though I don’t like the beeping I like how the hoverboard is safe, the wheels have good grip, turning is great, and I just overall love this hoverboard. App is horrible don’t try and download it. At least for me it didn’t work at all."
customer_reviews.author: Maiu Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, don’t last!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these last Christmas one lasted three months the other lasted 6 months... they did send a new one for the first one that stopped working. But that one lasted a whopping two months! I have been trying to get in touch with the company about the second one and I am having a hard time getting in touch with anyone . Very annoyed to have spent so much money and have them quit working after a few months. I would not recommend this product. Very upsetting when my children were so excited and happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my daughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: She's been using this hover board since Christmas and loves it! She thinks that the lights and Bluetooth speakers make it very cool. The Bluetooth has consistently connected to our phones without any problem and the music feature makes it especially fun for a kid (and adult). It feels well constructed and has held up well to everyday use. My daughter loves it so much that she will frequently use it while doing chores and other activities around the house. I'd definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Kids and my wife love it. They've been fighting to wake up in the morning first to get a time slice on the hover board without having to wait in line. They are constantly battling for time to ride it throughout the day too. I thought I'd buy one and they could share it, but I may have to buy separate ones so at least the boys can ride them together. I was pretty excited to learn that both my 5 and 8 year olds became very comfortable riding it within such a short time. Good buy. I recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 4 months of minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: 8-year-old daughter enjoyed this for the first 4 months, but there is now a problem with balancing and movement. In short, it no longer works and I am confused about how to get this repaired under the 1-year warranty??
customer_reviews.author: redstrawberry95

customer_reviews.title: Tomoloo doesn’t respond to emails
customer_reviews.text: Hover board is fine if it’s working. My daughters battery doesn’t charge and I’ve been trying to get a hold of them for months to fix it with no luck. Very disappointing. **update** I was able to finally get it replaced from the seller. I appreciated that they finally made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday Present!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my 12 year old son!! He loves and it figured out how to use it, within 10 minutes. Instruction manual is clear and concise!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great hoverboard
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it but on line says holds up to 265 but on the Hoover board clearly says 165!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love Hoverboards!
customer_reviews.text: We gave the grandkids (ages 8 and 10, boy and girl) Hoverboards for their birthdays. They loved them and took to them immediately. However, I would like to see the instructions revised a bit. The phrasing is difficult to understand sometimes. This is the only reason I gave a 4 star instead of 5. As always, delivery was quick. Items were extremely well packaged. The Hoverboards appear to be very sturdy. We've only had them one day so I am unable to evaluate battery use.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hover board for our 9 year old daughter. She loves it! We were a little surprised that the weight limit was 165 lbs because we all wanted to have a go with it but since it was actually for our 50 lb 9 year old it served its purpose. In truth, it probably kept us old people from injury as we are not the agile creatures we once were.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old for her birthday and she loves it!!!!!!! It keeps a charge for a while and able to ride on thin carpet and tile, wood and other slightly plush surfaces! She loves that it can play music. We have not tried it yet because she needs a phone to hook it up to but I’m sure it works like a charm just like the description said. The instructions are easy to read and understandable and tell you exactly what you need to know on how to treat your board! I would buy again when my youngest gets a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Overall 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We received the product yesterday. My daughter was able to jump on it for about 30 min before the battery needed charged which is awesome considering that it would be hard for someone to not want to try something out for a few minutes upon receiving. The lights work great and the hoverboard transitioned from one surface to another really well but we only tried it indoors (so from carpet to flooring). The auto-leveling is perfect to ensure she can ride it without concern. We will buy a second one for my younger daughter in May for her birthday as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lucente

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Toomoloo Hoverboard.
customer_reviews.text: This hoverboard is perfect for my 7 year old. It charged in a few hours and was in use. Learning to balance and ride in the house was a good idea. The board maintains a charge for longer than expected. Overall, we are very please with our purchase and would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: There was nothing I didn’t like about this hover board my son and I was ...
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing I didn’t like about this hover board my son and I was extremely happy with this product everything u see and read is exactly what u get I love it and recommend it it’s so kool with the lights off too
customer_reviews.author: Texie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hover Board for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I researched the best hover boards for kids on multiple review sites online and the TOMOLOO was highly recommended. So I purchased it for my grandson for his 10th birthday and it definitely met all expectations. My grandson was able to use right out of the box with no assembly required and there was sufficient charge for him to try it out for about 30 minutes. He loves it and the lights definitely add to the fun. I was impressed by how quickly he was able to master it. It is durable, stable and from watching him appears easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite feature is the bluetooth speaker to play her favorite ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old received this for a birthday present. Her favorite feature is the bluetooth speaker to play her favorite music. Since she is a daredevil she wishes it went a little faster but as the mom I think it is just perfect. The battery life could be a little longer but I think part of that is my daughter being impatient and not letting it fully charge each time. Overall, I would purchase this again. My older daughter wants one and I will probably get her the same kind.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Charging port
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and my five year old that we bought it for, for her bday loves it. She can’t get enough of it. The only complaint I have so far is that the charging port is now loose after only 2 weeks that it’s been used. Her bday was January 27 but purchased before that. It charges but just a lil annoyed that it’s loose. Other than that so far it’s been good to us. Only reason why I’m giving it a four star
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for our pre-teen.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her hoverboard. She wants to ride it everywhere. The battery life is long and it is well constructed. I didn't want to get something that wasnt sturdy enough for her. This really meets all my expectations. It is really sharp looking too especially when the lights are on and she is gliding along on it. So glad we got it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Judie
